name: Oven-Baked Chicken with Potatoes
instructions: Preheat the oven to 200°C. Toss potatoes with butter and season with oregano and salt. Add chicken and spread everything on a baking tray. Bake for 20–35 minutes (depending on thickness) until browned and cooked through. Serve hot.

name: Oven-Baked Chicken with Broccoli
instructions: Preheat the oven to 200°C. Toss broccoli with butter and season with paprika and salt. Add chicken and spread everything on a baking tray. Bake for 20–35 minutes (depending on thickness) until browned and cooked through. Serve hot.

name: Chicken and Onion Sandwich
instructions: Lightly toast the bread if you want extra crunch. Layer chicken, yogurt, and onion. Add a small amount of vinegar for moisture and flavor, then close and slice. Serve right away.

name: Eggs and Onion Sandwich
instructions: Lightly toast the bread if you want extra crunch. Layer eggs, cheese, and onion. Add a small amount of mustard for moisture and flavor, then close and slice. Serve right away.

name: Quick Eggs with Cheese
instructions: Heat butter in a pan over low-to-medium heat. Add eggs and cook gently, stirring when needed. Finish with cheese and season with chili flakes and salt. Serve warm.

name: Eggs and Tomato Sandwich
instructions: Lightly toast the bread if you want extra crunch. Layer eggs, yogurt, and tomato. Add a small amount of vinegar for moisture and flavor, then close and slice. Serve right away.

name: Noodles with Garlic and Lentils
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil and cook the noodles until al dente. Meanwhile, heat vinegar in a pan over medium heat and sauté garlic until softened. Add lentils and cook until done, then season with oregano. Drain the noodles, toss it in the pan, and finish with cream. Serve hot.

name: Couscous Bowl with Carrot and Chicken
instructions: Rinse the couscous if needed, then cook it in salted water until tender. In a separate pan, warm soy sauce and sauté carrot until fragrant. Add chicken and cook through, then season with chili flakes. Fold the cooked couscous into the pan and stir well. Finish with butter for extra richness and serve.

name: Couscous Bowl with Pepper and Chicken
instructions: Rinse the couscous if needed, then cook it in salted water until tender. In a separate pan, warm vinegar and sauté pepper until fragrant.
